entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
